title: Diamond Mid/Support LFT
body:
OPGG linked in post. 

I'm playing solo Q with the intention of climbing to a respectable rank in order to join or make a team with other players of a similar rank, I planned on making a post once I hit diamond 1 or challenger however I felt it wise to put some feelers out before I hit these ranks. 

Currently d5 75 lp,  my main goal at this time is to climb the solo Q ladder simply because I don't believe I'll find a place on a strong team with out having obtained Challenger first. 

Please add me in the client with offers and if I'm in game when you get your first opportunity to message please wait until after the game to message me :)
